page.title: 05INDUSTRIES
page.content: There are several industries in the area.{Farming}is very important and is carried out side by side with the army, the land belonging to the M.O.D. {Builders, plumbers, electricians, {painters and decorators}are represent- ed in each village. { Wiltshire's youngest brewery,}a private concern, is housed in {Netheravon. { A meat factory,}specialising in pork, is situated in{Figheldean. The motorist is well cared for by two family{garages and a petrol station. In{Netheravon}is a family hairdress- ing business. A{private coach company}has the responsiblity of carrying children from outlying villages to their com- prehensive school and answering the call for private hire.
